headline: A Look At Citigroup (C) Valuation As New Preferred Stock And Bond Issuances Reshape Its Capital Mix
summary: Capital moves reshape Citigroup’s funding mix Citigroup (C) has moved to redeem its Series X preferred stock while introducing a new 6.250% Noncumulative Preferred Stock, Series II, along with several new bond deals that together reshape its capital and funding profile. See our latest analysis for Citigroup. Those capital moves come as Citigroup’s share price, last closing at $122.69, shows firm momentum, with a 6.0% 1 day share price return and a 20.9% 90 day share price return. The 1 year...

headline: Citi Remains Bullish on KLA (KLAC) Amid Persistent Phase 2 Upcycle in Wafer Fab Equipment and Potential Upside
summary: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 30, 2026, KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) attracted increased attention from analysts when Citi increased its price target from $1,450 to $1,800 while reiterating a ‘Buy’ rating. headline: Inside the Risks of Investing in Art
summary: Once seen as a pure passion play, art has become deeply intertwined with finance, credit, and wealth planning. As prices fluctuate and liquidity tightens, collectors face new risks alongside opportunity. We speak with longtime collector and investor Peter Kraus, Citi art-finance head Fotini Xydas, Fine Art Group president Anita Heriot, and auction veteran Edward Dolman about how today's art market works.

raw.headline: Inside the Risks of Investing in Art

headline: Chipotle CEO Says Higher-Income Customers Give Company 'Confidence' To Keep Raising Prices: Report
summary: Scott Boatwright said the company plans to continue raising prices, citing that 60% of its core customers earn over $100,000 annually.
